channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Le gouvernement veut bloquer l’accès à Shein dans les 48 heures
item.description: Shein est de nouveau dans le viseur de l’exécutif. Après une série de découvertes jugées « gravement illicites » dans ses rayons, le gouvernement réclame le blocage express du site en France. L’éditeur irlandais de la plateforme comme les principaux FAI sont sommés d’agir sous 48 heures, sur fond d’enquêtes élargies à d’autres géants du e-commerce.

item.title: Trump Kills Plan to Compensate Travelers With Cash for Delayed Flights
item.description: Great timing.

item.title: Peacock has canceled Poker Face after two seasons - but Rian Johnson wants a Game of Thrones star to help him revive it
item.description: Poker Face has been canceled by Peacock, but creator Rian Johnson has plans to revive it with a new star in the lead role.

item.title: Les astronomes tombent sur une surprise : notre Système solaire se déplacerait presque 4 fois plus vite qu’on ne le pensait !
item.description: Comprendre les déplacements de notre Système solaire au sein de la Voie lactée est particulièrement complexe. Désormais, de nouvelles observations semblent montrer une trajectoire… Mais elles contredisent énormément les simulations sur le sujet.

item.title: Test du Realme P3 5G : le champion du gaming à moins de 200 euros
item.description: Avec son P3 5G, Realme propose un smartphone d'entrée de gamme à moins de 250 euros qui concentre ses efforts sur la performance et l'autonomie.

item.title: Anthropic says an AI may have just attempted the first truly autonomous cyberattack
item.description: The company has upgraded its detection tools after uncovering thousands of automated requests per second—far beyond anything human hackers could produce. In a new report, AI company Anthropic detailed a “highly sophisticated espionage campaign” that deployed its artificial intelligence tools to launch automated cyberattacks around the globe.

item.title: A Brand New ‘Star Trek’ Movie Is Coming From the Team Behind ‘Dungeons & Dragons’
item.description: Jonathan Goldstein and John Francis Daley have been hired to make a whole new 'Star Trek' film.

item.title: Fortnite is coming to the Xbox PC store
item.description: Fortnite is going to be available on the Xbox on PC app beginning November 18th. Right now on PC, you have to launch the game from the Epic Games Launcher, but if you prefer the Xbox on PC app, that’s going to be an option. The game is also joining the Xbox Play Anywhere program, […]

item.title: Hacked company CTO refuses to pay ransom demand, donates money to funding research instead
item.description: Following a breach of an improperly decommissioned cloud drive, Checkout.com refuses to pay ransom.

item.title: Voici à quoi ressemblera le premier vaisseau habité pour Mars : un expert européen nous détaille les plans
item.description: L’exploration habitée de Mars, un objectif emblématique du XXIe siècle, s’annonce comme l’un des défis les plus ambitieux de notre époque, avec des missions prévues à l’horizon 2050. Dans ce contexte dynamique, Thales Alenia Space s'engage dans le développement de la station cislunaire Gateway,...

item.description: 'Last Rites' will join the rest of the 'Conjuring' films on HBO Max for some holiday chills November 21.

item.title: China’s Stranded Astronauts Return Home, But Its Space Station Crisis Is Far From Over
item.description: After space debris damaged a parked capsule, another crew remains on board Tiangong with no ride home.

item.title: Supergreens powder and supplements recalled nationwide after Salmonella outbreak sickens people in 7 states
item.description: Products containing moringa leaf powder are being yanked from shelves as the FDA investigates an outbreak that has caused three hospitalizations. The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is investigating a multistate outbreak of Salmonella infections linked to powdered dietary supplements. According to the latest update from the agency, the outbreak has sickened almost a dozen people, with three hospitalized....

item.title: The latest opioid settlement plan with OxyContin maker Purdue Pharma could end the yearslong legal saga
item.description: Only 218 out of more than 54,000 personal injury victims rejected Purdue’s latest bankruptcy plan. Lawyers representing OxyContin maker Purdue Pharma, branches of the Sackler family that own it, cities, states, counties, Native American tribes, people with addiction and others across the U.S. are expected to deliver a nearly unanimous message for a bankruptcy court judge Friday: Approve a plan to settle thousands of opioid-related lawsuits against the company.If U.S. Bankruptcy Judge Sean Lane abides, it will close a long chapter — and maybe the entire book — on a legal odyssey over efforts to...

item.title: On a testé la Wallbox Pulsar Pro : la borne (presque) parfaite ? Complète, mais encore perfectible
item.description: La marque Wallbox est une des références dans le domaine des bornes de recharge et la Pulsar Pro s'impose comme l'un des modèles les plus avancés du marché. Elle dispose notamment d'une des connectivités les plus avancées, mais également d'un câble attaché avec obturateur, devenu obligatoire en France. Voyons ce qu'elle vaut en utilisation quotidienne et comment elle se démarque de la concurrence. ...

item.title: How to watch Slovakia vs Northern Ireland: 2026 World Cup Qualifier, free streams, TV channels, preview
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Slovakia vs Northern Ireland as they fight it out in Group A this Friday from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Trump tried to brand a Democratic shutdown. It didn’t work
item.description: A government shutdown is always a blame game. Now that it’s over, it’s time to ask: Who played the better match? President Donald Trump has worked to blame Democrats for the government shutdown, but a majority of Americans are unconvinced that it’s Democrats’ fault.

item.title: Anthropic reports AI-driven cyberattack linked to China
item.description: The operation targeted about 30 individuals who worked at tech companies, financial institutions, chemical companies, and government agencies. A team of researchers has uncovered what they say is the first reported use of artificial intelligence to direct a hacking campaign in a largely automated fashion.
